meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned about hypercubes and their unique properties.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study hypercubes to understand higher dimensions beyond our usual perception.
meanings.sent3: The hypercubes at the geometry exhibit seemed to dance in the air, captivating the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a hypercube, holding multiple thoughts and ideas simultaneously.
meanings.sent5: The concept of hypercubes can be mind-boggling, but it opens up a whole new world of possibilities.

meanings.definition: A geometric figure with more than three dimensions
meanings.sent1: Exploring the concept of hypercubes can lead to a deeper understanding of spatial dimensions.
meanings.sent2: Artists often use hypercubes as inspiration for creating abstract sculptures.
meanings.sent3: The hypercubes in the science fiction movie were used as portals to travel between galaxies.
meanings.sent4: His imagination soared like a hypercube, envisioning worlds beyond our comprehension.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of hypercubes lies in their ability to challenge our perception of space and reality.
